Disease.content:

Paragraph: The patient was diagnosed with drug - induced baboon syndrome based on his history , which included prior sensitivity to topical ketoconazole , a physical examination , and histopathological findings .

| drug - induced baboon syndrome |

The disease entity in the paragraph is "drug - induced baboon syndrome". It is a rare skin condition that occurs as a side effect of certain medications. The hyphen and the space around it are part of the condition's name, so I have included them in the entity.
